titles: My lord mayor and this Court of Aldermen taking into consideration the wants and necessities of the honest and laborious poore inhabitants (especially of the out parishes) of this city ...
author: City of London (England).
notes: Title from first 3 lines of text.
At head of title: Chiverton mayor. Thursday the 4th of February 1657.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
